sentences.english: Anyone could win tonight.
sentences.chinese: 今晚任何人都可能赢。

sentences.english: They offer help and advice to anyone interested in becoming a teacher.
sentences.chinese: 他们为任何有兴趣当老师的人提供帮助和咨询。

sentences.english: If anyone sees Lisa, ask her to call me.
sentences.chinese: 如果有谁看见莉萨，叫她打电话给我。

sentences.english: Anyone else who is interested in going on the trip should see me at the end of this lesson.
sentences.chinese: 还有谁有兴趣参加此次旅行，下课来找我。

detailed_translations.english: used to refer to any person, when it is not important to say exactly who

sentences.english: I haven't got anywhere to live.
sentences.chinese: 我没有任何地方住。

detailed_translations.english: in or to any place

sentences.english: It’s wonderful what doctors can do nowadays.
sentences.chinese: 如今医生的本领着实令人称奇。

detailed_translations.chinese: 极好的，精彩的，绝妙的；奇妙的；美妙；胜；神妙
detailed_translations.english: making you admire someone or something very much

sentences.english: ...spending her few waking hours in front of the TV.
sentences.chinese: …把她清醒的个把钟头花在电视机前。

detailed_translations.english: not many or hardly any people or things

name: quite a few
trans: 相当多；不少(后接可数名词)

sentences.english: I can name quite a few of these but one of the more sensitive conditions is female incontinence.
sentences.chinese: 我能说出相当多疾病的名字而其中一个比较敏感的就是女性尿失禁。

sentences.english: I personally know quite a few intelligent people who (in certain situations and circumstances) can be kinda stupid. I'm know 'cause I'm one of them!
sentences.chinese: 我个人知道相当多的一些有才智的人，在某些情况和场景下，是有一些愚蠢，因为我也是其中之一。

detailed_translations.chinese: 相当多；不少(后接可数名词)

sentences.english: Which class has the most children in it?
sentences.chinese: 哪个班级孩子最多？

sentences.english: She’s one of the most experienced teachers in the district.
sentences.chinese: 她是该地区最有经验的教师之一。

detailed_translations.english: a larger amount or number than anyone or anything else
having the greatest amount of a particular quality

sentences.english: There’s something in my eye.
sentences.chinese: 我眼睛里有什么东西。

sentences.english: Sarah said something about coming over later.
sentences.chinese: 萨拉说她等一会儿过来什么的。

sentences.english: I don’t know what he does exactly, but I know it has something to do with computers (= is related to them in some way ) .
sentences.chinese: 我不知道他具体是干什么的，只知道和电脑有关。

detailed_translations.english: used to mean a particular thing when you do not know its name or do not know exactly what it is

detailed_translations.chinese: 重要的人；值得重视的事

sentences.english: Nothing ever happens in this town.
sentences.chinese: 这镇上从来都不会发生什么特别的事。

sentences.english: There’s nothing in this box.
sentences.chinese: 这盒子里什么也没有。

sentences.english: There was nothing else the doctors could do.
sentences.chinese: 医生们没有别的办法了。

sentences.english: He had nothing more to say.
sentences.chinese: 他没有更多要说的了。

sentences.english: We know nothing about her family.
sentences.chinese: 我们对她的家庭一无所知。

sentences.english: I couldn’t just stand by and do nothing.
sentences.chinese: 我不能就那样袖手旁观。

sentences.english: I promised to say nothing about it to anyone.
sentences.chinese: 我答应这件事对谁也不说。

sentences.english: We’ve heard nothing from her for weeks.
sentences.chinese: 我们好几个星期没有她的音信了。

sentences.english: There’s absolutely nothing to be ashamed of.
sentences.chinese: 根本没有什么好难为情的。

sentences.english: ‘Do you know much about business?’ ‘Nothing at all.’
sentences.chinese: “你对做生意了解得多吗？”“一窍不通。”

sentences.english: She had eaten virtually nothing at supper.
sentences.chinese: 晚饭她几乎什么也没吃。

sentences.english: There’s nothing wrong with the data.
sentences.chinese: 这些数据没什么差错。

sentences.english: There’s nothing new about this.
sentences.chinese: 这没有什么新鲜的。

sentences.english: A brief search was made but they found nothing untoward.
sentences.chinese: 他们简单地搜查了一番，没发现任何异常。

sentences.english: She’s nothing like her brother.
sentences.chinese: 她一点都不像她的哥哥。

detailed_translations.english: not anything or no thing
to have no qualities or features that are similar to someone or something else

sentences.english: If everyone is ready, I’ll begin.
sentences.chinese: 如果大家都准备好了，我就开始。

sentences.english: Send my best wishes to everyone in the family.
sentences.chinese: 请向全家人致以最美好的祝愿。

sentences.english: Of course everyone else thought it was hilarious!
sentences.chinese: 当然其他所有人都觉得好笑极了！

sentences.english: Not everyone enjoys sport.
sentences.chinese: 并不是谁都喜欢体育运动的。

detailed_translations.english: every person

sentences.english: Well, she won, of course.
sentences.chinese: 噢，当然是她赢啦。

sentences.english: You should of course keep copies of all your correspondence.
sentences.chinese: 你当然应该保留所有信函的复印件。

sentences.english: Of course there will be some difficult times ahead.
sentences.chinese: 今后当然会有遇到困难的时候。

detailed_translations.english: used to show that other people probably already know what you are saying is true, or expect to hear it

sentences.english: I blame myself for what has happened.
sentences.chinese: 发生这一切都怪我自己。

sentences.english: I can look after myself.
sentences.chinese: 我可以照顾好自己。

sentences.english: I’m making myself a sandwich.
sentences.chinese: 我在给自己做三明治。

detailed_translations.english: used by the person speaking or writing to show that they are affected by their own action

sentences.english: Look at yourself in the mirror.
sentences.chinese: 照照镜子吧。

sentences.english: Come and warm yourselves by the fire.
sentences.chinese: 到火边来暖暖身子。

sentences.english: Have you hurt yourself?
sentences.chinese: 你伤到自己了吗？

sentences.english: Go and buy yourself an ice cream.
sentences.chinese: 去给你自己买个冰激凌吧。

detailed_translations.english: used when talking to someone to show that they are affected by their own action

sentences.english: The chickens gathered under the hen.
sentences.chinese: 小鸡聚集在母鸡翅膀下面。

sentences.english: The chickens gathered under the hen.
sentences.chinese: 小鸡集聚在母鸡翅膀下面。

sentences.english: The hen sits in the hencoop [henroost].
sentences.chinese: 母鸡卧窝。

detailed_translations.english: an adult female chicken

sentences.english: He kept pigs and poultry.
sentences.chinese: 他养过猪和家禽。

detailed_translations.english: a farm animal with short legs, a fat body and a curved tail. Pigs are kept for their meat, which includes  pork  ,  bacon  and  ham  .

sentences.english: Ann didn’t seem very sure.
sentences.chinese: 安看来并不十分肯定。

sentences.english: It seems a foolish decision now.
sentences.chinese: 现在看来这是一个愚蠢的决定。

sentences.english: It seems like you’re catching a cold, Taylor.
sentences.chinese: 你好像感冒了，泰勒。

sentences.english: ‘So Bill’s leaving her?’ ‘ So it seems (= that seems to be true ) .’
sentences.chinese: “这么说来，比尔要离开她？”“好像是这样。”

detailed_translations.english: if something seems to be true, there are qualities or facts that make people think it is true

sentences.english: He was easily bored.
sentences.chinese: 他很容易感到厌烦。

sentences.english: After a while, I got bored and left.
sentences.chinese: 过了一会儿，我觉得无聊，就走了。

detailed_translations.english: tired and impatient because you do not think something is interesting, or because you have nothing to do

sentences.english: What would you do if someone tried to rob you in the street?
sentences.chinese: 要是有人在街上抢劫你，你会怎么办？

sentences.english: Will someone please explain what’s going on?
sentences.chinese: 谁能说说是怎么回事？

sentences.english: Have Brooks or someone fax this to New York right away.
sentences.chinese: 叫布鲁克斯或谁立刻把这个发传真到纽约。

detailed_translations.english: used to mean a person, when you do not know or do not say who the person is

sentences.english: Inge kept a diary (= wrote in a diary ) during the war years.
sentences.chinese: 英奇在战争年代里一直写日记。

detailed_translations.english: a book in which you write down the things that happen to you each day

sentences.english: Everyone is free to engage in peaceful political activity.
sentences.chinese: 每个人都可以自由参加和平的政治活动。

sentences.english: fund-raising activities
sentences.chinese: 筹款活动

sentences.english: Regular physical activity helps to control your weight.
sentences.chinese: 定期参加体育活动有助于控制体重。

detailed_translations.english: things that people do, especially in order to achieve a particular aim

name: decide
trans: 决定；选定(decide to do sth)

sentences.english: Has anything been decided yet?
sentences.chinese: 已经作出什么决定了吗？

sentences.english: The trainees decide among themselves what programs to take.
sentences.chinese: 受训者自行选择课程。

sentences.english: After a long discussion, they decided in favour of (= chose ) the older applicant.
sentences.chinese: 经过长时间的讨论，他们决定选那位较年长的求职者。

detailed_translations.english: to make a choice or judgment about something, especially after considering all the possibilities or arguments

name: try
trans: 尝试；设法；努力  (try to do sth /try doing sth)

sentences.english: Let’s have a rest and then we’ll try again.
sentences.chinese: 我们休息一下，然后再试。

sentences.english: I tried everything to lose weight with no success.
sentences.chinese: 我试了各种方法减肥，但都没有成功。

sentences.english: I tried and tried (= kept making an effort ) and eventually I was offered a job.
sentences.chinese: 我一次次地尝试，终于有人给了我一份工作。

sentences.english: Try as he might (= as hard as he could ) , he could not get the incident out of his mind.
sentences.chinese: 他想尽办法，但脑子里仍摆脱不掉那件事。

detailed_translations.chinese: 试图，努力；试验；审判；考验
detailed_translations.english: to take action in order to do something that you may not be able to do
an attempt to do something

sentences.english: Adventurous travelers can go heli-skiing, paragliding and bungee jumping.
sentences.chinese: 好冒险的旅行者可以去高山滑雪，空中滑翔跳伞和蹦极。

detailed_translations.english: a sport in which you jump off a hill or out of a plane and use a  parachute  to fly for long distances before floating back down to the ground

sentences.english: wild birds
sentences.chinese: 野鸟

sentences.english: The dawn was filled with the sound of birds.
sentences.chinese: 黎明时分，鸟鸣声不绝于耳。

sentences.english: a flock of birds
sentences.chinese: 一群飞鸟

sentences.english: a wooden bird cage
sentences.chinese: 木制鸟笼

detailed_translations.english: a creature with wings and feathers that can usually fly. Many birds sing and build nests, and female birds lay eggs

sentences.english: Can James ride a bicycle yet?
sentences.chinese: 詹姆斯会骑自行车了吗？

detailed_translations.english: a vehicle with two wheels that you ride by pushing its pedals with your feet

sentences.english: The offices are on the top two floors of the building.
sentences.chinese: 办公室在大楼最高的两层。

sentences.english: a farmhouse and other farm buildings
sentences.chinese: 农舍以及其他的农场建筑

sentences.english: There is a limited supply of land for building.
sentences.chinese: 建筑用地供应有限。

detailed_translations.english: a structure such as a house, church, or factory, that has a roof and walls

sentences.english: a small trader who sells hats in Oxford
sentences.chinese: 在牛津卖帽子的小贩

sentences.english: To the surprise of many Wall Street traders, the dollar rose yesterday.
sentences.chinese: 使很多华尔街经纪人意外的是，昨天美元上涨了。

detailed_translations.english: someone who buys and sells goods or stocks

sentences.english: What are they going to do now, I wonder ?
sentences.chinese: 我想知道，他们现在打算怎么办呢？

sentences.english: He’s been leaving work early a lot – it makes you wonder , doesn’t it?
sentences.chinese: 他最近经常提早下班——让人觉得奇怪，是不是？

detailed_translations.english: to think about something that you are not sure about and try to guess what is true, what will happen etc

sentences.english: There’s a big difference between knowing that something is true, and being able to prove it.
sentences.chinese: 知道什么正确与能够证明它正确，这之间有很大的不同。

sentences.english: There's not much difference in price between the two computers.
sentences.chinese: 这两种计算机价格上没有多大的差别。

sentences.english: We have our differences , but she's still my sister.
sentences.chinese: 我们之间虽然不和，但她仍旧是我的妹妹。

detailed_translations.english: a way in which two or more people or things are not like each other

sentences.english: a low wooden table with a glass top
sentences.chinese: 玻璃桌面的矮木桌

detailed_translations.chinese: 顶部，顶端；上部；首席；陀螺
detailed_translations.english: the highest part of something

detailed_translations.chinese: 高出，超越；结束；达到顶点
detailed_translations.english: to be higher than a particular amount
nearest to the top of something

sentences.english: Hurry up! Everyone’s waiting.
sentences.chinese: 快点！大家在等着呢。

sentences.english: Would you mind waiting outside?
sentences.chinese: 你在外面等好吗？

sentences.english: We’ve been waiting ages.
sentences.chinese: 我们已经等了很长时间了。

detailed_translations.english: to stay somewhere or not do something until something else happens, someone arrives etc
a period of time in which you wait for something to happen, someone to arrive etc

sentences.english: It started to rain, so Tricia stopped to put up her umbrella.
sentences.chinese: 开始下雨了，所以特里西娅停下来撑起雨伞。

sentences.english: I spent the day on the beach, lying under a beach umbrella, reading.
sentences.chinese: 那天我就在海滩上度过，躺在海滩遮阳伞下面看书。

detailed_translations.chinese: 雨伞；保护伞；庇护；伞形结构
detailed_translations.english: an object that you use to protect yourself against rain or hot sun. It consists of a circular folding frame covered in cloth.

sentences.english: I’ve washed your shirt but it’s still wet.
sentences.chinese: 我把你的衬衫洗过了，不过现在还是湿的。

sentences.english: wet grass
sentences.chinese: 湿草地

sentences.english: The man in the boat was wet through (= completely wet ).
sentences.chinese: 船上的那人浑身湿透。

detailed_translations.english: covered in or full of water or another liquid
the rain
to make something wet

sentences.english: His business went under because of competition from the large corporations.
sentences.chinese: 由于大公司的竞争，他的生意陷入了困境。

sentences.english: There were fewer temporary engineers to plug in in that city because of low pay.
sentences.chinese: 由于报酬低，该城市雇用得到的临时工程师就更少了。

sentences.english: Many species are in peril of extinction because of our destruction of their natural habitat.
sentences.chinese: 许多物种由于我们破坏了它们的自然环境， 现在正面临灭绝的危险。

sentences.english: an animal that lives below ground
sentences.chinese: 生活在地下的动物

sentences.english: Water was dripping onto the floor below.
sentences.chinese: 水滴到下面的地板上。

sentences.english: I could hear voices in the courtyard below my window.
sentences.chinese: 我能听到院子里有人在我的窗下说话。

sentences.english: They camped a few hundred feet below the summit.
sentences.chinese: 他们在山峰下面几百英尺的地方扎了营。

sentences.english: Down below, people were talking and laughing.
sentences.chinese: 下面，人们谈笑风生。

sentences.english: Somewhere far below, a door slammed.
sentences.chinese: 下面远远的什么地方有一扇门砰地关上了。

sentences.english: The kitchen is directly below her bedroom.
sentences.chinese: 厨房就在她卧室的正下方。

sentences.english: Captain Parker went below (=  to the lower level of the ship  ) , leaving Clooney in charge.
sentences.chinese: 帕克船长下去了，让克卢尼掌舵。

detailed_translations.chinese: 在下面，在较低处；在本页下面
detailed_translations.english: in a lower place or position, or on a lower level

sentences.english: Is there enough room for me?
sentences.chinese: 有足够的地方给我吗？

sentences.english: We didn't leave early enough.
sentences.chinese: 我们离开得不够早。

detailed_translations.english: used before plural or uncountable nouns to mean ‘as many or as much as sb needs or wants ’
to the necessary degree

sentences.english: I was cold, tired, and hungry.
sentences.chinese: 我又冷，又累，又饿。

sentences.english: If you get hungry, there’s some cold chicken in the fridge.
sentences.chinese: 你要是饿了，冰箱里有些冷鸡肉。

sentences.english: Do you still feel hungry?
sentences.chinese: 你还觉得饿吗？

sentences.english: She is hungry for success.
sentences.chinese: 她渴望成功。

detailed_translations.english: wanting to eat something

sentences.english: I saw Peter as I was getting off the bus.
sentences.chinese: 我下公共汽车的时候看见了彼得。

sentences.english: As time passed, things seemed to get worse.
sentences.chinese: 随着时间的推移，情况似乎变得更加糟糕了。

sentences.english: Just as the two men were leaving, a message arrived.
sentences.chinese: 那两个男子刚要离开，消息就传来了。

detailed_translations.english: while or when

sentences.english: Their house is on a hill overlooking the sea.
sentences.chinese: 他们的房子建在可以俯视大海的小山上。

sentences.english: A cart was making its way up the hill.
sentences.chinese: 一辆马车正在爬上山丘。

detailed_translations.english: an area of land that is higher than the land around it, like a mountain but smaller

sentences.english: If she hadn’t ducked, the ball would have hit her.
sentences.chinese: 如果她没有弯腰躲闪的话，那个球就可能击中她了。

sentences.english: Tim ducked down to comb his hair in the mirror.
sentences.chinese: 蒂姆低下身在镜子前梳头发。

sentences.english: She ducked her head to look more closely at the inscription.
sentences.chinese: 她低下头更仔细地看碑文。

detailed_translations.chinese: 鸭子似的突然扎入水中； 突然低下
detailed_translations.english: to lower your head or body very quickly, especially to avoid being seen or hit
a very common water bird with short legs and a wide beak, used for its meat, eggs, and soft feathers

sentences.english: Why do you dislike her so much?
sentences.chinese: 你为什么那么讨厌她？

sentences.english: My dislike of thunder and even small earthquakes was due to Mother.
sentences.chinese: 我对雷声甚至于轻微地震的厌恶都归因于我的母亲。

detailed_translations.english: to think someone or something is unpleasant and not like them
Dislike is the feeling that you do not like someone or something

name: have a good time
trans: 等于enjoy oneself/have fun(doing sth)玩得痛快

detailed_translations.chinese: 等于enjoy oneself/have fun(doing sth)玩得痛快

sentences.english: The Central Park is not so well grassed as it used to be.
sentences.chinese: 中央公园不如过去那样芳草如茵了。

sentences.english: But they find themselves drawn back to their elm in Central Park. Spending a night there is spiritually restorative, they said, if a bit chilly of late.
sentences.chinese: 但他们还是带着疲倦的身躯回到了中央公园的橡树那儿，并说，尽管最近有点儿冷，但在这棵树上睡一夜有助于恢复精神。

sentences.english: After a quick lunch, I moved on to the central attraction of this area, the giant Huangguoshu waterfall.
sentences.chinese: 匆匆吃过午饭以后，我动身前往这个景区的中心景点黄果树大瀑布。

sentences.english: They cruised to Hong Kong on their vacation.
sentences.chinese: 他们在假期里到香港去游览。

sentences.english: He settled in Malaysia.
sentences.chinese: 他定居马来西亚。

sentences.english: But in all of Malaysia?
sentences.chinese: 但是在整个马来西亚呢？

sentences.english: I come from Malaysia.
sentences.chinese: 我来自马来西亚。

detailed_translations.chinese: 马来西亚（东南亚国家）；马来群岛

name: Weld Quay
trans: 海乾街/码头, 位于马来西亚槟城岛(州)

detailed_translations.chinese: 海乾街/码头, 位于马来西亚槟城岛(州)

name: Penang Hill
trans: 马来西亚槟榔山（升旗山）

detailed_translations.chinese: 马来西亚槟榔山（升旗山）

sentences.english: Men are doing more housework nowadays.
sentences.chinese: 现今男人正在承担越来越多的家务。

detailed_translations.english: work that you do to take care of a house, for example washing, cleaning etc

sentences.english: My parents divorced when I was six, and I hardly knew my father.
sentences.chinese: 我六岁时父母离婚，我对父亲几乎一无所知。

sentences.english: The children were so excited they could hardly speak.
sentences.chinese: 孩子们兴奋得几乎连话都说不出来了。

sentences.english: I can hardly believe it.
sentences.chinese: 这简直让我难以置信。

sentences.english: (= almost no one ) writes to me these days.
sentences.chinese: 如今几乎没有人给我写信了。

sentences.english: Dad ate hardly anything (= almost nothing ).
sentences.chinese: 爸爸几乎没吃什么东西。

sentences.english: There was hardly any (= very little ) traffic.
sentences.chinese: 路上车少人稀。

sentences.english: She lives in Spain, so we hardly ever (= almost never ) see her.
sentences.chinese: 她住在西班牙，所以我们几乎见不到她。

detailed_translations.english: almost not

sentences.english: Nothing ever seems to upset him.
sentences.chinese: 似乎从来没有什么事情会使他烦恼。

sentences.english: Have you ever been to Paris?
sentences.chinese: 你去过巴黎吗？

sentences.english: I don’t think I’ve ever been here before.
sentences.chinese: 我觉得我以前从未到过这里。

sentences.english: It was raining harder than ever.
sentences.chinese: 当时下着前所未有的大雨。

detailed_translations.english: used in negative sentences and questions, or sentences with if to mean ‘at any time’

sentences.english: Shy people find conversation difficult; they hardly ever speak up because they're too busy worrying about the impression they're making.
sentences.chinese: 害羞的人觉得交谈很困难；他们几乎从来不大声说话，因为他们太忙于顾虑自己给别人留下的印象。

sentences.english: I’ve only met her once.
sentences.chinese: 我只见过她一面。

sentences.english: Paul’s been to Wexford once before.
sentences.chinese: 保罗曾去过韦克斯福德一次。

detailed_translations.english: on one occasion only
from the time when something happens

sentences.english: He was questioned by police twice yesterday.
sentences.chinese: 他昨天被警察审问了两次。

sentences.english: None of our dinner menus are exactly the same twice over .
sentences.chinese: 我们的晚餐菜单从没有完全重样的。

detailed_translations.english: two times

sentences.english: Do you have access to the Internet?
sentences.chinese: 你上得了网吗？

detailed_translations.english: a computer system that allows millions of computer users around the world to exchange information

sentences.english: Any large high-speed computer can be programmed to learn.
sentences.chinese: 任何大型高速计算机都可以通过编程获得学习能力。

detailed_translations.english: to give a computer a set of instructions that it can use to perform a particular operation

sentences.english: The train was completely full.
sentences.chinese: 火车坐得满满的。

sentences.english: Don’t talk with your mouth full.
sentences.chinese: 嘴里塞满东西时不要说话。

sentences.english: The class is full, but you can register for next term.
sentences.chinese: 这个班已经满了，不过你可以注册下学期的。

sentences.english: The Health Centre offers a full range of services.
sentences.chinese: 医疗中心提供全套服务。

detailed_translations.english: containing as much or as many things or people as possible, so there is no space left

sentences.english: Let your arms swing as you walk.
sentences.chinese: 边走边摆动双臂。

sentences.english: a sign swinging in the wind
sentences.chinese: 在风中摇摆的指示牌

sentences.english: He was swinging his bag back and forth .
sentences.chinese: 他前后甩动着他的包。

sentences.english: She swung her legs from side to side .
sentences.chinese: 她左右晃动着两条腿。

sentences.english: She swung her legs from side to side .
sentences.chinese: 他对准球猛地挥拍一击。

detailed_translations.english: to make regular movements forwards and backwards or from one side to another while hanging from a particular point, or to make something do this
a swinging movement or rhythm

sentences.english: They're learning to swing dance in a class called whole body thinking.
sentences.chinese: 他们正在一节叫做“全身思考”的课堂中学习摇摆舞。

sentences.english: Rachel's dream has, for years now, been to be a professional swing dance instructor (specifically a Lindy Hop instructor).
sentences.chinese: 瑞秋很多年来都梦想去成为一名职业的摇摆舞教练，特别是林迪舞教练。

sentences.english: Maybe it’s all just a big misunderstanding.
sentences.chinese: 也许这只是一个很大的误会。

sentences.english: ‘Do you think he’ll come back?’ ‘Maybe.’
sentences.chinese: “你认为他会回来吗？”“也许会吧。”

sentences.english: Maybe they’re right, but maybe not .
sentences.chinese: 也许他们是对的，但也许不是。

sentences.english: You have talent, maybe even genius.
sentences.chinese: 你很有才能，甚至可以说有天赋。

sentences.english: He said he’d finish the work soon – maybe tomorrow.
sentences.chinese: 他说他很快就会完成那项工作——也许是明天。

detailed_translations.english: used to say that something may happen or may be true but you are not certain

sentences.english: He's the best teacher, even though he has the least experience.
sentences.chinese: 他虽然经验最少，却是最出色的老师。

sentences.english: He’s my least favourite member of staff.
sentences.chinese: 他是最不讨我喜欢的员工。

detailed_translations.english: smallest in size, amount, degree, etc.
less than anything or anyone else

sentences.english: Remember, at least you have me.
sentences.chinese: 翀记住，至少你还有我。

sentences.english: This cupboard’s full of junk.
sentences.chinese: 这个壁橱里塞满了杂物。

detailed_translations.english: old or unwanted objects that have no use or value
to get rid of something because it is old or useless

sentences.english: Sharon fears that her love of junk food may have contributed to her cancer.
sentences.chinese: 莎伦怕她对垃圾食品的喜好可能导致了她的癌症。

detailed_translations.english: food that is not healthy, for example because it contains a lot of fat, sugar etc

sentences.english: Do you want a cup of coffee?
sentences.chinese: 你要来杯咖啡吗？

sentences.english: Do you like your coffee white (= with milk ) or black (= without milk ) ?
sentences.chinese: 你的咖啡要加奶还是不加奶？

detailed_translations.english: a hot dark brown drink that has a slightly bitter taste

name: health
trans: 健康；人的身体或精神状态

sentences.english: I’m worried about my husband’s health.
sentences.chinese: 我担心我丈夫的健康状况。

sentences.english: Even if you haven’t got much money, at least you’ve got your health.
sentences.chinese: 即使你没有太多钱，但起码你拥有健康。

detailed_translations.english: the general condition of your body and how healthy you are

sentences.english: How would you cope with unemployment and the resulting loss of income?
sentences.chinese: 你会如何应付失业及由此造成的收入损失？

detailed_translations.english: if something results from something else, it is caused by it
something that happens or exists because of something that happened before

sentences.english: At the end of the day, add up the percent DVs.
sentences.chinese: 在一天结束后，把所有营养素的百分比加起来。

sentences.english: Machines are delivering up to only 25 percent of the fuel they combust.
sentences.chinese: 机器的运转效率只能达到所耗燃料的百分之二十五。

sentences.english: But there are billions more people out there who are not in the top one percent, and they’re not in the top two or three either.
sentences.chinese: 但是还有十亿多的人不在其中，他们不在其中的百分之一，也不再其中的两百分之一或者三百分之一的其中。

sentences.english: All the city’s schools will be online by the end of the year.
sentences.chinese: 到年底，市里的所有学校都会连接因特网。

sentences.english: ...the cool stuff you find online.
sentences.chinese: …你在网上找到的好东西。

detailed_translations.english: connected to other computers through the Internet, or available through the Internet
While connected to a computer or under computer control.

sentences.english: Lucy turned on the television to watch the evening news.
sentences.chinese: 露西打开电视收看晚间新闻。

sentences.english: They have a television in every room.
sentences.chinese: 他们每个房间都配有电视。

detailed_translations.english: a piece of electronic equipment shaped like a box with a screen, on which you can watch programmes

sentences.english: Although in poor health, she continued to carry out her duties.
sentences.chinese: 尽管身体不好，她仍继续执行任务。

sentences.english: We decided to take rooms in Longwood House, although we knew we could not really afford the rent.
sentences.chinese: 虽然我们知道自己其实付不起租金，但还是决定住朗伍德庄园的房间。

sentences.english: Although I can’t help admiring the man’s courage, I do not approve of his methods.
sentences.chinese: 尽管我不得不佩服那个男子的勇气，却并不赞成他的方法。

detailed_translations.english: used to introduce a statement that makes your main statement seem surprising or unlikely

sentences.english: How many working days were lost through sickness last year?
sentences.chinese: 去年因为员工生病损失了多少个工作日？

detailed_translations.english: because of something

sentences.english: It is impossible to understand the complex nature of the human mind.
sentences.chinese: 要想了解人类思维复杂的特性是不可能的。

sentences.english: Mind and body are closely related.
sentences.chinese: 思想和肉体紧密相连。

sentences.english: Meditation involves focusing the mind on a single object or word.
sentences.chinese: 冥想需要把思想集中在一个物体或单词上。

sentences.english: Sorry─your name has gone right out of my mind.
sentences.chinese: 对不起——我完全想不起你的名字了。

detailed_translations.english: your thoughts or your ability to think, feel, and imagine things

sentences.english: the human body
sentences.chinese: 人体

sentences.english: My fingers were numb and my whole body ached.
sentences.chinese: 我手指麻木，浑身疼痛。

sentences.english: He needs to overcome a negative body image (=  what you think about your own body  ) .
sentences.chinese: 他需要克服对自己身体的负面印象。

sentences.english: A dog found the body of a girl in the woods.
sentences.chinese: 一条狗在树林里发现了一具女孩的尸体。

sentences.english: the main body of the text
sentences.chinese: 课文的正文

detailed_translations.english: the physical structure of a person or animal

sentences.english: How dared they do such a thing?
sentences.chinese: 他们怎么敢做出这样的事?

sentences.english: He would not succumb to such an item.
sentences.chinese: 他不会对这样的条款做出让步的。

detailed_translations.english: used to show that you think that something is not good enough or that there is not enough of it

sentences.english: But what if you have a lot of audio material to listen to, such as audio books or podcasts?
sentences.chinese: 但是如果你有很多像有声书或播客这样的音频材料要听，那该怎么办呢？

sentences.english: We have better use for our money such as saving or sharing it, and because I want my children to care about their impact on the environment, the economic state of our country and our humanity.
sentences.chinese: 我们要更好的用我们的钱，比如存起来或和别人一起共享，因为我希望我的孩子认识到他们自己对环境的影响，以及我们国家经济状况和我们的人性。

sentences.english: A better way to do all this is to load the data into one database, then perform a query, such as that shown below.
sentences.chinese: 做所有这些事情的一个更好办法是将数据加载到一个数据库中，然后执行查询，比如下面的查询。

sentences.english: We’ve very much enjoyed working together .
sentences.chinese: 我们在一起工作非常开心。

sentences.english: They’ve decided to spend more time together.
sentences.chinese: 他们决定要花更多时间在一起。

sentences.english: He and my father were at school together.
sentences.chinese: 他和我父亲一起上过学。

sentences.english: Together they went back inside the villa.
sentences.chinese: 他们一起回到了别墅里。

detailed_translations.chinese: 一起；同时；相互；连续地；总共
detailed_translations.english: if two or more people do something together, they do it with each other

detailed_translations.chinese: 新潮的；情绪稳定的，做事有效率的

sentences.english: He died in 1985 at the age of 76.
sentences.chinese: 他1985年去世，终年76岁。

sentences.english: Her father died suddenly in an accident when she was only ten.
sentences.chinese: 她年仅10岁时父亲突然死于一场意外事故。

sentences.english: She died peacefully in her sleep at the age of 98.
sentences.chinese: 她在睡眠中安然辞世，享年98岁。

sentences.english: The bullet went straight through his head, and he died instantly.
sentences.chinese: 子弹穿过他的头部，他当场死亡。

sentences.english: Our love will never die.
sentences.chinese: 我们的爱始终不渝。

detailed_translations.english: to stop living and become dead

sentences.english: She’s one of my favourite writers.
sentences.chinese: 她是我最喜欢的作家之一。

sentences.english: a science-fiction writer
sentences.chinese: 科幻小说作家

detailed_translations.english: someone who writes books, stories etc, especially as a job

sentences.english: Visit your dentist twice a year for a checkup.
sentences.chinese: 每年看两次牙医做检查。

detailed_translations.english: someone whose job is to treat people’s teeth

sentences.english: a magazine article
sentences.chinese: 杂志中的文章

sentences.english: She glanced over the magazine racks.
sentences.chinese: 她扫了一眼杂志架。

detailed_translations.english: a large thin book with a paper cover that contains news stories, articles, photographs etc, and is sold weekly or monthly

name: however
trans: 然而；无论如何；不管多么

sentences.english: This is a cheap and simple process. However, there are dangers.
sentences.chinese: 这是个花钱少而又简单的方法，不过有危险。

sentences.english: an extremely unpleasant disease that is, however, easy to treat
sentences.chinese: 一种让人极其难受却容易治疗的病

sentences.english: However you look at it, it's going to cost a lot.
sentences.chinese: 不管你怎么看，它都要花很多钱。

detailed_translations.english: used when you are adding a fact or piece of information that seems surprising, or seems very different from what you have just said

sentences.english: Natalie was prettier than her sister.
sentences.chinese: 纳塔莉比她姐姐漂亮。

sentences.english: You need that money more than I do.
sentences.chinese: 你比我更需要那笔钱。

sentences.english: There were more people there than I expected.
sentences.chinese: 那里的人比我预想的要多。

sentences.english: If it costs more than $60, I won’t buy it.
sentences.chinese: 如果价格超过60美元，我就不买了。

sentences.english: She had woken even earlier than usual.
sentences.chinese: 她甚至比平时醒得更早。

sentences.english: Divorce is more common than it was a generation ago.
sentences.chinese: 现在离婚比上一代人常见了。

detailed_translations.chinese: 比（用于形容词、副词的比较级之后）；除…外（用于other等之后）；与其…（用于 rather等之后）；一…就（用于 no sooner等之后）
detailed_translations.english: used when comparing two things, people, situations etc
very

sentences.english: Have you almost finished?
sentences.chinese: 你差不多完成了吗？

sentences.english: Supper’s almost ready.
sentences.chinese: 晚饭就要做好了。

sentences.english: It was almost midnight.
sentences.chinese: 午夜将至。

sentences.english: Almost nothing was done to improve the situation.
sentences.chinese: 几乎没有采取什么措施来改善这个情况。

sentences.english: The story is almost certainly true.
sentences.chinese: 这故事几乎肯定是真实的。

sentences.english: He’s almost as old as I am.
sentences.chinese: 他差不多跟我一样大。

detailed_translations.english: nearly, but not completely or not quite

name: none
trans: 没有人；没有任何东西，毫无

sentences.english: I wish I could offer you some cake but there’s none left.
sentences.chinese: 我真想能请你吃些蛋糕，但一点也没剩的了。

sentences.english: Although these were good students, none had a score above 60.
sentences.chinese: 虽然这些都是好学生，但是没有一个考到60分以上。

sentences.english: She waited for a reply, but none came.
sentences.chinese: 她等着答复，可是什么也没等到。

sentences.english: Even an old car is better than none.
sentences.chinese: 有一辆旧车也比没有车强。

sentences.english: I was none too pleased to have to take the exam again.
sentences.chinese: 我要重考一次，根本高兴不起来。

detailed_translations.english: not any amount of something or not one of a group of people or things
not at all

sentences.english: Doctors recommend eating less salt.
sentences.chinese: 医生建议少吃盐。

sentences.english: Maybe he would worry less if he understood the situation.
sentences.chinese: 他要是了解情况，也许就不会那么担心了。

sentences.english: In recent years she has appeared in public less frequently.
sentences.chinese: 近年来她在公开场合露面的次数少了。

detailed_translations.english: a smaller amount or not as much
not so much or to a smaller degree

sentences.english: Spend less than you earn, go without until you have the money.
sentences.chinese: 一定要比自己挣的花的少，如果没有那么多钱，就不要行动。

sentences.english: At this stage, you begin settling for less than what you deserve.
sentences.chinese: 在这个阶段，尽管你得到的比应得的要少，但你还是勉强接受。

name: point
trans: 看法；要点；重点；小数点；目标；分数

sentences.english: The party's share of the vote fell by ten percentage points.
sentences.chinese: 该党的得票率下跌了十个百分点。

sentences.english: Here are the main points of the news.
sentences.chinese: 以下是新闻摘要。

sentences.english: There are three important points we must bear in mind.
sentences.chinese: 有三个要点我们必须记住。

sentences.english: He is three points behind the leader.
sentences.chinese: 他落后领先者三分。

detailed_translations.english: a mark or unit on a scale of measurement

sentences.english: We’re looking for someone with an outgoing personality.
sentences.chinese: 我们在找一个性格外向的人。

detailed_translations.chinese: 外出的， 离开的； 即将离职的； 友好的， 好交际的； 外向的
detailed_translations.english: someone who is outgoing likes to meet and talk to new people

sentences.english: Your stereo is better than mine.
sentences.chinese: 你的音响比我的好。

sentences.english: There must be a better way to do this.
sentences.chinese: 一定还有更好的办法来做这件事。

sentences.english: He can speak French a lot better than I can.
sentences.chinese: 他法语讲得比我好多了。

detailed_translations.english: more useful, interesting, satisfactory, effective, suitable etc
to a higher standard or quality

sentences.english: The audiences stamped loudly to express their grievances.
sentences.chinese: 听众大声地踏脚以表达他们的不满。

sentences.english: Rosa shut the door quietly.
sentences.chinese: 罗莎悄悄关上门。

sentences.english: ‘I’m sorry,’ she said quietly.
sentences.chinese: “对不起。”她轻声说道。

sentences.english: a quietly-spoken man (= one who always speaks quietly )
sentences.chinese: 说话轻柔的男人

detailed_translations.english: without making much noise

sentences.english: a hard-working teacher
sentences.chinese: 努力工作的老师

detailed_translations.chinese: 勤劳的， 辛勤工作的
detailed_translations.english: working with a lot of effort

sentences.english: Going to trade fairs is an ideal opportunity to size up the competition .
sentences.chinese: 参加商品交易会是估量竞争规模的理想机会。

detailed_translations.english: a situation in which people or organizations try to be more successful than other people or organizations

sentences.english: You look fantastic!
sentences.chinese: 你看上去棒极了！

sentences.english: It’s a fantastic place, really beautiful!
sentences.chinese: 这真是个好地方，漂亮极了！

detailed_translations.chinese: 极好的， 极出色的， 了不起的； 极大的； 难以相信的； 异想天开的， 不实际的； 奇异的， 古怪的
detailed_translations.english: extremely good, attractive, enjoyable etc

sentences.english: Which book are you looking for?
sentences.chinese: 你在找哪本书？

sentences.english: Which are the most important crops?
sentences.chinese: 哪些农作物是最重要的？

sentences.english: Miranda was sure it was one of them, but was not sure which.
sentences.chinese: 米兰达确定此人是他们其中的一个，但不能肯定是哪一个。

detailed_translations.english: used to ask or talk about one or more members of a group of people or things, when you are uncertain about it or about them

sentences.english: Please speak clearly.
sentences.chinese: 请说得清楚点。

sentences.english: The economy was clearly failing.
sentences.chinese: 经济很明显在走下坡路。

detailed_translations.english: in a way that is easy to see, hear, or understand

sentences.english: Who’s winning (= who is most successful at this point in the game )?
sentences.chinese: 现在谁领先？

detailed_translations.english: to be the best or most successful in a competition, game, election etc
a success or victory, especially in sport

sentences.english: Two heart attacks in a year. It hasn’t stopped him smoking, though.
sentences.chinese: 一年里心脏病发作了两次，可是那也没让他把烟戒掉。

sentences.english: It sounds like a lot of fun. Isn’t it rather risky though?
sentences.chinese: 听上去很有趣。可是这不是也很危险吗？

detailed_translations.english: used after adding a fact, opinion, or question which seems surprising after what you have just said, or which makes what you have just said seem less true
used to introduce a statement that makes the main statement coming after it seem surprising, unlikely, or unexpected

sentences.english: a talented actor
sentences.chinese: 一名很有天赋的演员

detailed_translations.english: having a natural ability to do something well

sentences.english: His work is truly original.
sentences.chinese: 他的作品确实十分独特。

sentences.english: Fawcett was a truly remarkable man.
sentences.chinese: 福西特是一位真正不同凡响的人。

sentences.english: a truly great work of medieval literature
sentences.chinese: 一部真正伟大的中世纪文学作品

detailed_translations.english: used to emphasize that the way you are describing something is really true

sentences.english: ‘He looked angry.’ ‘ I don’t care !’
sentences.chinese: “他好像很生气。”“我不管！”

sentences.english: She felt that nobody cared.
sentences.chinese: 她觉得没有人在乎。

sentences.english: The picture had been drawn with great care.
sentences.chinese: 这幅图画得非常用心。

detailed_translations.english: to think that something is important, so that you are interested in it, worried about it etc
when you are careful to avoid damage, mistakes etc

sentences.english: I don't care about his opinion.
sentences.chinese: 我才不管他是什么意见呢。

sentences.english: She always cares about losing her job.
sentences.chinese: 她总是担心丢掉她的工作。

sentences.english: I really care about the students in my class.
sentences.chinese: 我确实喜欢我班上的学生。

sentences.english: the serious problem of unemployment
sentences.chinese: 严重的失业问题

sentences.english: Luckily, the damage was not serious.
sentences.chinese: 还好，损坏不算严重。

sentences.english: Serious crimes have increased dramatically.
sentences.chinese: 重大犯罪案件大幅度增加了。

sentences.english: Oil spills pose a serious threat to marine life.
sentences.chinese: 原油泄漏对海洋生物构成了严重威胁。

sentences.english: The president was in serious trouble .
sentences.chinese: 总统遇到大麻烦了。

detailed_translations.chinese: 严肃的，严重的；认真的；庄重的；危急的
detailed_translations.english: a serious situation, problem, accident etc is extremely bad or dangerous

sentences.english: He spends hours in front of the mirror !
sentences.chinese: 他老是照镜子！

sentences.english: When I looked in the mirror I couldn’t believe it. I looked fantastic!
sentences.chinese: 我看着镜子简直不敢相信，我看上去棒极了！

sentences.english: Henry’s sad smile mirrored that of his son.
sentences.chinese: 亨利脸上那苦涩的笑容跟他儿子一模一样。

sentences.english: The economic recovery in Britain was mirrored in the US.
sentences.chinese: 美国出现了和英国相似的经济复苏。

detailed_translations.english: a piece of special glass that you can look at and see yourself in
if one thing mirrors another, it is very similar to it and may seem to copy or represent it

sentences.english: She’d always loved animals since she was a little kid.
sentences.chinese: 她从小就喜爱动物。

sentences.english: He’s married with three kids.
sentences.chinese: 他已婚，有三个孩子。

sentences.english: A neighbor volunteered to keep an eye on the kids (= their children or the children they are responsible for ).
sentences.chinese: 一位邻居主动来照看这些小孩。

sentences.english: college kids
sentences.chinese: 大学生

detailed_translations.english: a child

sentences.english: They can be applied in any context, as long as you understand how to apply them, of course.
sentences.chinese: 他们可以在任何一种背景下应用，当然，只要你懂得如何去应用他们。

sentences.english: Why, in its presence, should I deny the joy of living, as long as I know everything is not included in this joy?
sentences.chinese: 为什么在生活的快乐明明存在时，只要我知道一切都不存在于这种快乐中，我就会否认这种快乐？

sentences.english: But he said as long as we remained the only intelligent life in our galaxy and avoided destroying ourselves we should be safe.
sentences.chinese: 但是他说只要我们保持在我们的星系中是唯一有智力的生命并且避免破坏我们自己，我们就会安全。

sentences.english: The booklet provides all the necessary information about the college.
sentences.chinese: 这本小册子提供了关于那所学院的所有必需信息。

sentences.english: No further changes were considered necessary.
sentences.chinese: 没有必要作出进一步改变。

sentences.english: The doctor says it may be necessary for me to have an operation.
sentences.chinese: 医生说我可能需要做手术。

sentences.english: The closure of the factory was a necessary consequence of increased competition from abroad.
sentences.chinese: 工厂倒闭是来自国外的竞争加剧的必然结果。

detailed_translations.english: something that is necessary is what you need to have or need to do

sentences.english: They are new – they can help us make the most of our caring – and that’s why the future can be different from the past.
sentences.chinese: 它们在不断更新——它们可以帮助我们让我们的爱心做最多的事情——这就是为什么未来总与过去不同。

sentences.english: If you're doing iterative development, what you want to measure in the Elaboration phase will be different from what you measure in the Construction phase.
sentences.chinese: 如果你正在做迭代开发，什么是你想在细化阶段测量的将与什么是你想在构建阶段测量的是不同的。

sentences.english: When the node is on the same host, the installation directory has to be different from that of the deployment manager, since they are two different product installations.
sentences.chinese: 当节点在同一个主机上时，安装目录应该不同于部署管理器的安装目录，这是因为它们是两个不同的产品安装。

sentences.english: Both Helen’s parents are doctors.
sentences.chinese: 海伦的父母都是医生。

detailed_translations.english: used to talk about two people, things etc together, and emphasize that each is included

sentences.english: Pencils are graded according to softness.
sentences.chinese: 铅笔按软硬度分级。

sentences.english: The best grades of tea are expensive.
sentences.chinese: 最上等的茶叶价格很贵。

detailed_translations.english: to say what level of a quality something has, or what standard it is
a particular level of quality that a product, material etc has

sentences.english: He shouldn’t be so selfish.
sentences.chinese: 他不该这么自私。

sentences.english: Why should anyone want to marry Tony?
sentences.chinese: 怎么竟然会有人意嫁给托尼？

detailed_translations.english: used to say what is the right or sensible thing to do

sentences.english: But I deal with people there, the same as what I should do here.
sentences.chinese: 但是在那里我是分管人事工作的，这一点与我将在这里工作一样。

sentences.english: You can’t judge a book by its cover, as the old saying goes.
sentences.chinese: 老话说得好，人不可貌相。

detailed_translations.english: a well-known short statement that expresses an idea most people believe is true and wise

name: reach
trans: 到达；伸出；达成；取得联系；延伸；(伸手)去够

sentences.english: We reached London late at night.
sentences.chinese: 我们深夜到达伦敦。

sentences.english: She reached into her bag and produced a business card.
sentences.chinese: 她伸手从包里取出一张名片。

sentences.english: Chelsea could reach the final of the European Cup.
sentences.chinese: 切尔西队会进入欧洲杯决赛。

detailed_translations.english: to arrive at a place

sentences.english: Steve gripped the steering wheel tightly with both hands.
sentences.chinese: 史蒂夫双手紧握方向盘。

sentences.english: In her hand was a tattered old photograph.
sentences.chinese: 她手中拿着的是一张破旧的老照片。

sentences.english: the hour hand
sentences.chinese: 时针

detailed_translations.english: the part of your body at the end of your arm, including your fingers and thumb, that you use to hold things

sentences.english: She reached out to touch his arm.
sentences.chinese: 她伸手去碰他的胳膊。

sentences.english: If your house has been burgled, you shouldn’t touch anything until the police arrive.
sentences.chinese: 如果家中被盗，在警察赶到之前不要动任何物品。

sentences.english: ‘Don’t touch me!’ she yelled.
sentences.chinese: “别碰我！”她大叫道。

sentences.english: Her plight has touched the hearts of people around the world.
sentences.chinese: 她的困境触动了全世界人的心弦。

sentences.english: She felt a gentle touch on her shoulder.
sentences.chinese: 她感到有人轻轻碰了一下她的肩膀。

detailed_translations.english: to put your hand, finger etc on someone or something
the action of putting your hand, finger, or another part of your body on something or someone

sentences.english: Regular exercise is good for the heart.
sentences.chinese: 经常锻炼对心脏有好处。

sentences.english: Can you hear my heart beating?
sentences.chinese: 你能听见我的心跳吗？

sentences.english: Her cheeks were hot and her heart was pounding.
sentences.chinese: 她脸颊发烫，心怦怦直跳。

sentences.english: My heart raced. Were we going to land safely?
sentences.chinese: 我心跳得厉害。我们能安全着陆吗？

sentences.english: Daniel had no history of heart problems.
sentences.chinese: 丹尼尔没有心脏病史。

sentences.english: She suffers from a rare heart condition.
sentences.chinese: 她患有罕见的心脏病。

sentences.english: His breathing and heart rate were now normal.
sentences.chinese: 他的呼吸和心率现在都正常了。

detailed_translations.english: the organ in your chest which pumps blood through your body

sentences.english: First of all, we need to know the facts of the case.
sentences.chinese: 首先，我们需要了解案子的相关事实。

detailed_translations.english: a piece of information that is known to be true

sentences.english: I know the mayor really well. In fact, I had dinner with her last week.
sentences.chinese: 我跟市长很熟，事实上，我上周还和她一起吃过饭呢。

detailed_translations.english: used when you are adding something, especially something surprising, to emphasize what you have just said

name: break
trans: 打碎；折断；违背；结束; 打破 (困难或不快的情形)

sentences.english: I had to break a window to get into the house.
sentences.chinese: 我只得打破一扇窗户进屋。

detailed_translations.english: if you break something, you make it separate into two or more pieces, for example by hitting it, dropping it, or bending it

sentences.english: Dave has a broken arm .
sentences.chinese: 戴夫手臂断了。

sentences.english: Tim’s mother put her arms around him.
sentences.chinese: 蒂姆的母亲伸出双臂搂着他。

sentences.english: Pat was carrying a box under his arm .
sentences.chinese: 帕特腋下挟着一个盒子。

sentences.english: He had a pile of books in his arms .
sentences.chinese: 他抱着一摞书。

sentences.english: They walked along the beach arm in arm (=  with their arms bent around each other’s  ) .
sentences.chinese: 他们臂挽臂走在沙滩上。

sentences.english: The old lady rushed to greet him, arms outstretched .
sentences.chinese: 老太太张开双臂，快步上前迎接他。

detailed_translations.chinese: 手臂；武器；袖子；装备；部门
detailed_translations.english: one of the two long parts of your body between your shoulders and your hands
to provide weapons for yourself, an army, a country etc in order to prepare for a fight or a war

sentences.english: Maria looked at him and laughed.
sentences.chinese: 玛丽亚看着他大笑起来。

sentences.english: Tony was laughing so hard he had to steady himself on the table.
sentences.chinese: 托尼笑得太厉害了，靠着桌子才能让自己站稳。

sentences.english: Nora laughed so much that she nearly cried.
sentences.chinese: 诺拉笑得眼泪都快出来了。

sentences.english: He couldn’t help it; he burst out laughing (= suddenly started laughing ).
sentences.chinese: 他情不自禁地放声大笑起来。

sentences.english: He’s one of the few writers who can make me laugh out loud.
sentences.chinese: 有几位作家能让我放声大笑，他是其中之一。

sentences.english: He gave a short laugh.
sentences.chinese: 他笑了一声。

detailed_translations.english: to make sounds with your voice, usually while you are smiling, because you think something is funny
the act of laughing or the sound you make when you laugh

sentences.english: As a kid he’d never share his toys.
sentences.chinese: 他小时候从不肯与人分享他的玩具。

detailed_translations.english: to let someone have or use something that belongs to you
one of the equal parts into which the  ownership  of a company is divided

sentences.english: The book fell to the floor with a loud bang.
sentences.chinese: 书砰的一声掉落到地上。

sentences.english: The music was so loud that I had to shout.
sentences.chinese: 音乐太响了，我只得大声地喊。

sentences.english: ‘Who’s there?’ asked David in a loud voice.
sentences.chinese: “是谁？” 戴维大声问道。

detailed_translations.english: making a lot of noise

sentences.english: We have similar tastes in music.
sentences.chinese: 我们对音乐的品位相近。

sentences.english: Both approaches seem to achieve similar results.
sentences.chinese: 两种方法都得出了相似的结果。

sentences.english: A number of his friends had been affected in a similar way .
sentences.chinese: 他的一些朋友也受到了类似的影响。

sentences.english: The two products look quite similar .
sentences.chinese: 这两种产品看上去很相似。

detailed_translations.english: almost the same

sentences.english: We also tend to be similar to our friends and family on income and wealth measures.
sentences.chinese: 我们在收入和财富衡量标准方面也趋向于我们的朋友和家庭成员。

name: primary
trans: 小学教育的，初级教育的；原始的；最初的

sentences.english: Our primary concern is to provide the refugees with food and health care.
sentences.chinese: 我们的头等大事是向难民提供食品和医疗。

sentences.english: Many of the villagers rely on fishing as their primary source of income.
sentences.chinese: 很多村民以打鱼作为他们的主要收入来源。

sentences.english: Personal safety is of primary importance .
sentences.chinese: 人身安全至关重要。

detailed_translations.chinese: 首要的， 主要的； 基本的； 最初的， 初级的
detailed_translations.english: most important

sentences.english: So my primary school grade one, but also for the first time on school so successfully concluded.
sentences.chinese: 就这样我的小学一年级，也是平生第一次上学堂就这样圆满结束。

sentences.english: But for the teacher of the primary school where his little boy was going to have his first day.
sentences.chinese: 但是对于这位小学老师来说，他今天要给那里的小男孩们上第一堂课。

sentences.english: It is not acceptable for a child to finish primary school and not know what periods are or what they should do if they are abused.
sentences.chinese: 让一个小孩小学毕业了，却不知道月经是什么，也不知道如果他们受虐了该怎么做是让人不能接受的。

detailed_translations.english: a school for children between 5 and 11 years old in England and Wales

sentences.english: I need more information.
sentences.chinese: 我需要更多信息。

detailed_translations.english: facts or details that tell you something about a situation, person, event etc

sentences.english: It ushered in the new theater season.
sentences.chinese: 它预示了新的戏剧旺季的来临。

sentences.english: The theater emptied when the movie ended.
sentences.chinese: 电影结束了， 剧院里的人就走空了。

sentences.english: You know, like fencing, or theater or something.
sentences.chinese: 你知道，像是击剑，戏剧表演或什么的。

sentences.english: The bed wasn’t particularly comfortable.
sentences.chinese: 这床不大舒服。

detailed_translations.english: making you feel physically relaxed, without any pain or without being too hot, cold etc

sentences.english: I was in the back seat and Jo was driving.
sentences.chinese: 我在后座，乔开车。

sentences.english: a 10,000-seat stadium
sentences.chinese: 万人体育场

sentences.english: People were shifting in their seats, looking uncomfortable.
sentences.chinese: 人们在座位上动来动去，看上去不大自在。

sentences.english: He waved toward a chair, and seated himself at the desk.
sentences.chinese: 他朝一把椅子一挥手，在桌旁坐了下来。

detailed_translations.english: a place where you can sit, especially one in a vehicle or one from which you watch a performance, sports event etc

detailed_translations.chinese: 使…坐下；可容纳…的；使就职
detailed_translations.english: If you seat yourself somewhere, you sit down

sentences.english: a computer with an 18-inch colour screen
sentences.chinese: 带18英寸彩色屏幕的电脑

sentences.english: He went on staring at the TV screen .
sentences.chinese: 他继续盯着电视屏幕看。

detailed_translations.english: the part of a television or computer where the picture or information appears

detailed_translations.chinese: 掩蔽， 遮蔽； 放映， 播放； 审查， 甄别
detailed_translations.english: if something screens something else, it is in front of it and hides it

name: close
trans: 关；合拢；不开放；停业（暂时性或永久性）

sentences.english: Would you mind if I closed the window?
sentences.chinese: 我把窗户关上你不介意吧？

sentences.english: She closed the curtains.
sentences.chinese: 她拉上了窗帘。

sentences.english: Let me do the car door – it won’t close properly.
sentences.chinese: 我来修一下车门，它关不紧。

sentences.english: Beth closed her eyes and tried to sleep.
sentences.chinese: 贝丝合上眼睛想睡觉。

sentences.english: She heard the door close behind her.
sentences.chinese: 她听见门在她身后关上了。

sentences.english: I will now close the meeting by asking you to join me in a final toast.
sentences.chinese: 现在我要请大家最后干一杯来结束这次会议。

detailed_translations.english: to shut something in order to cover an opening, or to become shut in this way

sentences.english: Slow down or you'll get a ticket.
sentences.chinese: 开慢点儿，否则你会接到一张罚款通知单。

sentences.english: parking/speeding ticket
sentences.chinese: 违法停车/超速行驶罚款单

detailed_translations.english: a printed note ordering you to pay money because you have done something illegal while driving or parking your car

sentences.english: This is the worst recession for fifty years.
sentences.chinese: 这是50年来最严重的一次经济衰退。

sentences.english: My worst fear was that we would run out of food.
sentences.chinese: 我最大的担忧是我们会把食物吃光。

sentences.english: What is the worst possible thing that can happen?
sentences.chinese: 最糟可能会发生什么事？

sentences.english: Aid is being sent to areas that have been worst affected by the earthquake.
sentences.chinese: 援助物资正在送往受地震影响最严重的地区。

detailed_translations.english: worse than anything or anyone else
most badly

sentences.english: When you have your simplified core concept ready, then build that core concept very quickly and cheaply.
sentences.chinese: 如果你已经将核心概念简化，那么非常快速并且廉价地构建这一概念。

sentences.english: We used to listen to pop songs on the radio.
sentences.chinese: 我们以前常常听收音机里播放的流行歌曲。

sentences.english: They sat round with guitars, singing folk songs.
sentences.chinese: 他们弹着吉他围坐在一起唱民歌。

sentences.english: ...dance, music, mime, and song.
sentences.chinese: …舞蹈、音乐、哑剧和歌唱。

detailed_translations.english: a short piece of music with words that you sing

sentences.english: It took us ages to choose a new carpet.
sentences.chinese: 我们挑选新地毯花了很长时间。

sentences.english: A panel of judges will choose the winner.
sentences.chinese: 会由一个评判小组选出冠军。

sentences.english: He chose his words carefully as he spoke.
sentences.chinese: 他说话时字斟句酌。

sentences.english: You can, if you choose, invest in the stock market.
sentences.chinese: 如果你愿意，可以投资股票市场。

detailed_translations.english: to decide which one of a number of things or people you want

sentences.english: He folded the sheets up carefully.
sentences.chinese: 他把床单仔细地叠好。

detailed_translations.english: in a careful way

sentences.english: a news reporter
sentences.chinese: 新闻记者

detailed_translations.english: someone whose job is to write about news events for a newspaper, or to tell people about them on television or on the radio
until now

name: fresh
trans: 新的；新做的；新增的；新鲜的；清新的

sentences.english: I’ll just make some fresh coffee.
sentences.chinese: 我来重新煮点咖啡。

sentences.english: The report provides fresh evidence about the way the business was run.
sentences.chinese: 报告提供了有关该公司运营方式的新证据。

sentences.english: You’ll have to start again on a fresh sheet of paper.
sentences.chinese: 你得拿张新的纸重新开始。

sentences.english: The beans are fresh from the garden.
sentences.chinese: 这些豆子是刚从园子里摘来的。

detailed_translations.english: adding to or replacing something

sentences.english: The hotel is modern and comfortably furnished .
sentences.chinese: 这家宾馆很现代化，家具很舒适。

sentences.english: his comfortably baggy jeans
sentences.chinese: 他那宽松舒适的牛仔裤

detailed_translations.english: in a way that makes you feel physically relaxed, without any pain, or without being too hot, cold etc

sentences.english: The traffic is much worse after five o’clock.
sentences.chinese: 5点以后交通拥堵严重得多。

sentences.english: The weather was a lot worse this year.
sentences.chinese: 今年天气糟糕得多。

sentences.english: Conditions will get worse as the winter continues.
sentences.chinese: 随着冬天持续下去，情况会更糟。

sentences.english: High inflation will make unemployment worse.
sentences.chinese: 高通货膨胀率将使失业状况更加严重。

sentences.english: Don’t say anything, you’ll only make matters worse.
sentences.chinese: 什么也别说，说了只会火上浇油。

sentences.english: The bullying got worse and worse until finally he had to leave the school.
sentences.chinese: 他所受的欺侮越来越过分，最后只得离开了学校。

sentences.english: There’s nothing worse than being robbed while you’re on holiday.
sentences.chinese: 没有比度假时被抢劫更糟的了。

sentences.english: The school’s not perfect, but I suppose it could be worse.
sentences.chinese: 这所学校不是十全十美，不过我想还不算太糟吧。

detailed_translations.chinese: 更坏的；更差的；更恶劣的（bad的比较级）；（病情）更重的（ill的比较级）
detailed_translations.english: more unpleasant, bad, or severe

detailed_translations.chinese: 更糟；更坏；更恶劣地；更坏地
detailed_translations.english: in a more severe or serious way than before
something worse

name: service
trans: 公共服务系统，公共服务；公共事业机构

sentences.english: the health service
sentences.chinese: 医疗保健服务

sentences.english: the postal service
sentences.chinese: 邮政服务

sentences.english: the police service
sentences.chinese: 警察部门

sentences.english: the prison service
sentences.chinese: 监狱系统

sentences.english: Workers in the emergency services (= the police, hospital, and the fire service ) are forbidden from striking.
sentences.chinese: 紧急服务机构的工作人员是禁止罢工的。

sentences.english: There has been a decline in public services in recent years.
sentences.chinese: 近年来公共服务减少了。

sentences.english: {"GLOSS":["the police, hospitals, fire service, and organizations that provide basic things such as water, gas, or electricity"],"COLLOINEXA":["the essential services"]}
sentences.chinese: 基础服务部门

detailed_translations.english: the official system for providing something, especially something that everyone in a country needs to have, or the official organization that provides it

detailed_translations.chinese: 服务性的；耐用的；服现役的

detailed_translations.english: if someone services a machine or vehicle, they examine it and do what is needed to keep it working well

sentences.english: a pretty little girl
sentences.chinese: 漂亮的小姑娘

sentences.english: Maria looks much prettier with her hair cut short.
sentences.chinese: 玛丽亚把头发剪短好看多了。

detailed_translations.english: a woman or child who is pretty has a nice attractive face

sentences.english: Could we have the menu, please?
sentences.chinese: 请把菜单给我们，好吗？

sentences.english: a three course set menu
sentences.chinese: 三道菜的套餐

detailed_translations.english: a list of all the kinds of food that are available for a meal, especially in a restaurant

sentences.english: The company acted correctly in sacking him.
sentences.chinese: 公司解雇他做得对。

sentences.english: The jury decided that Walker had acted in self-defence.
sentences.chinese: 陪审团裁定沃克的行为属于自卫。

sentences.english: Politicians will only act when enough people demand that they do something.
sentences.chinese: 只有足够多的民众起来要求，政客们才会采取行动。

sentences.english: The padding acts as a cushion if the player falls or is hit by the ball.
sentences.chinese: 万一球员摔倒或者被球击中，衬垫可以起到缓冲作用。

sentences.english: The new president’s first act should be to end the war.
sentences.chinese: 新总统的第一步行动应当是结束战争。

detailed_translations.english: to do something in a particular way or for a particular reason
one thing that you do

sentences.english: We must have a meal together some time.
sentences.chinese: 我们一定要找个时间一起吃顿饭。

sentences.english: Dinner is the main meal of the day for most people.
sentences.chinese: 晚饭是大多数人一天中的主餐。

detailed_translations.english: an occasion when you eat food, for example breakfast or dinner, or the food that you eat on that occasion

sentences.english: This job is so boring. I wish I could do something more creative.
sentences.chinese: 这工作太单调了，我希望能做些更有创造性的事情。

sentences.english: I teach creative writing at Trinity College.
sentences.chinese: 我在三一学院教创意写作。

sentences.english: the creative process of writing a poem
sentences.chinese: 写诗的创作过程

sentences.english: Diaghilev did his great creative work in France.
sentences.chinese: 狄亚格列夫在法国编创了富有创新性的伟大作品。

sentences.english: a creative solution to the problem
sentences.chinese: 这一问题的创新性解决方法

detailed_translations.english: involving the use of imagination to produce new ideas or things

sentences.english: circus performers
sentences.chinese: 马戏演员

sentences.english: He was a better songwriter than performer.
sentences.chinese: 他更擅长写歌，而不是演唱。

detailed_translations.english: an actor, musician etc who performs to entertain people

sentences.english: He has a lot of talent , and his work is fresh and interesting.
sentences.chinese: 他很有天赋，作品新颖有趣。

sentences.english: a persuasive speaker with a natural talent for leadership
sentences.chinese: 有领导天赋、颇有辩才的演说者

sentences.english: His latest book reveals hidden talents.
sentences.chinese: 他最新的一本书展现了他深藏不露的才能。

sentences.english: Sadly, she inherited none of her father’s musical talent.
sentences.chinese: 可惜的是，她一点都没有继承她父亲的音乐天赋。

sentences.english: He is a great talent.
sentences.chinese: 他是个了不起的人才。

sentences.english: Britain’s footballing talent
sentences.chinese: 英国的足球天才

detailed_translations.english: a natural ability to do something well

sentences.english: Heart disease is one of the commonest causes of death.
sentences.chinese: 心脏病是最常见的死因之一。

sentences.english: They share a common interest in photography.
sentences.chinese: 他们在摄影方面兴趣相投。

detailed_translations.english: happening often and to many people or in many places

sentences.english: As a magician, his reputation spread all over the world.
sentences.chinese: 作为一个魔术师，他的名声传播到了世界各地。

detailed_translations.english: a man in stories who can use magic

sentences.english: No, blacks have all kinds of jobs.
sentences.chinese: 不，黑人从事各种各样的工作。

sentences.english: People have all kinds of ideas about what it should be.
sentences.chinese: 人们对创新是什么有各种各样的想法。

sentences.english: This seemed horrible to me, but I got all kinds of responses.
sentences.chinese: 这对我来说很可怕，但我得到了各种各样的反馈。

sentences.english: She has just landed the lead role in their latest production.
sentences.chinese: 她刚在他们最新的作品中取得了主角。

detailed_translations.english: the character played by an actor in a play or film

sentences.english: He or she will then show you how all these things, combined, play a role in choosing a career.
sentences.chinese: 然后他/她会向你解释如何将这些事情结合起来，在你择业时发挥作用。

sentences.english: I think this may be an extraordinary moment in history where Africa can become a continent of hope and the Bank can play a role in that.
sentences.chinese: 他说："我认为，这可能是历史上一个不同寻常的时刻，使非洲成为一个希望的大陆，世行可以在这方面发挥作用。

sentences.english: Five lucky winners will each receive a signed copy of the album.
sentences.chinese: 五位幸运的获胜者每人将得到一张签名专辑。

sentences.english: As a jockey he rode 10 winners.
sentences.chinese: 作为骑师他曾十度驾驭获胜赛马。

detailed_translations.english: a person or animal that has won something

sentences.english: In this month’s competition you could win a prize worth £3,000.
sentences.chinese: 在本月的竞赛中您可以赢得价值3,000英镑的奖品。

sentences.english: The first prize has gone to Dr John Gentle.
sentences.chinese: 获得一等奖的是约翰·金特尔博士。

sentences.english: The prizes are awarded (= given ) every year to students who have shown original thinking in their work.
sentences.chinese: 这些奖项每年颁发给在学习中表现出创造性思维的学生。

sentences.english: The total prize money was £30,000.
sentences.chinese: 奖金总额为3万英镑。

detailed_translations.english: something that is given to someone who is successful in a competition, race, game of chance etc
to think that someone or something is very important or valuable
good enough to win a prize or having won a prize

sentences.english: Everybody knows Tom.
sentences.chinese: 人人都认识汤姆。

detailed_translations.english: everyone

sentences.english: I think it's very unkind of you to make up stories about him.
sentences.chinese: 我认为你编造关于他的故事是很不友好的。

detailed_translations.english: If you make up something such as a story or excuse, you invent it, sometimes in order to deceive people

sentences.english: Many countries, for example Mexico and Japan, have a lot of earthquakes.
sentences.chinese: 许多国家，例如墨西哥和日本，经常发生地震。

sentences.english: Her courage is an example to us all.
sentences.chinese: 她的勇气是我们大家的榜样。

detailed_translations.english: something such as an object, a fact or a situation that shows, explains or supports what you say

sentences.english: Her family were so poor they couldn’t afford to buy her new clothes.
sentences.chinese: 她家穷得甚至买不起新衣服给她。

sentences.english: an area where poor people lived
sentences.chinese: 穷人居住区

sentences.english: one of the poorest countries in the world
sentences.chinese: 世界上最贫穷的国家之一

sentences.english: a poor part of Chicago (= where a lot of poor people live )
sentences.chinese: 芝加哥的一个贫民区

sentences.english: My grandparents grew up dirt poor (= very poor ) .
sentences.chinese: 我的祖父母在赤贫的环境里长大。

sentences.english: The country is poor in natural resources.
sentences.chinese: 该国自然资源匮乏。

detailed_translations.english: having very little money and not many possessions

sentences.english: Something was seriously wrong .
sentences.chinese: 出大问题了。

sentences.english: It’s time we talked seriously about our relationship.
sentences.chinese: 我们该认真谈一谈我们的关系了。

detailed_translations.english: very much or to a great degree

sentences.english: Researchers were given a £10,000 grant to continue their work.
sentences.chinese: 研究人员得到一万英镑的经费以继续他们的研究。

sentences.english: I’ve got some old diaries that my grandmother gave me years ago.
sentences.chinese: 我有几本旧日记本，是多年前祖母给我的。

sentences.english: I didn’t steal it! Maria gave it to me!
sentences.chinese: 我不是偷的！是玛丽亚给我的！

sentences.english: Most people are willing to give to charity .
sentences.chinese: 大多数人都愿意向慈善事业捐款。

sentences.english: The situation is now desperate, so please give generously .
sentences.chinese: 现在情况危急，请大家慷慨解囊。

detailed_translations.english: to let someone have something as a present, or to provide something for someone

sentences.english: a crowded room
sentences.chinese: 拥挤的房间

sentences.english: a crowded street
sentences.chinese: 拥挤的街道

sentences.english: The train was very crowded, and we had to stand.
sentences.chinese: 火车很挤，我们只好站着。

detailed_translations.english: too full of people or things

sentences.english: Yes, he was tired, but if he couldn't give me thelength of a sitcom--Jim and Pam are going to kiss!--then we were reallydone.
sentences.chinese: 是的，他很累。 但是如果他都不能给我看情景喜剧需要的半个小时的时间---吉姆和潘将会在剧中接吻---那么我们真的是完了。

sentences.english: Carol was very excited that I was interested in our family's history, even if it was just because a former sitcom actress told me to be.
sentences.chinese: 卡萝尔见到我开始对我们家的历史感兴趣，当然非常兴奋。 即使这只是因为我被前情景喜剧里的女演员逼着做的。

sentences.english: LISA KUDROW (Phoebe) had a hit after the show finished with HBO sitcom The Comeback and is now an executive producer on the US version of Who Do You Think You Are?
sentences.chinese: 丽莎库卓（菲比）：在《老友记》演出结束后，因加入HBO热门情景喜剧《归来记》而一度走红。 现在是美国版《你认为你是谁》的执行制片人。

sentences.english: The situation comedy is going to start soon, just switch to channel one.
sentences.chinese: 情景喜剧马上就要开播了，快调到一频道。

sentences.english: Lucy and Desi used a three-camera system on I Love Lucy allowing them to film their show for later broadcast, creating the TV situation comedy as we know it today.
sentences.chinese: 露西和德西用三位摄像机系统录制《我爱露西》，这使他们可以将此节目制成电影来播放，这也就诞生了我们今日所熟悉的这部电视喜剧。

sentences.english: As a TV program type, situation comedy has been in America for more than 50 years, and it developed well.
sentences.chinese: 作为一种电视节目类型，情景喜剧在美国已经有50多年的历史，而且发展成熟。

detailed_translations.english: a  sitcom

sentences.english: a late evening news broadcast
sentences.chinese: 晚间新闻节目

sentences.english: I hope to have some good news for you soon.
sentences.chinese: 我希望很快就能给你好消息。

detailed_translations.english: reports of recent events in the newspapers or on the radio or television

sentences.english: Wash thoroughly with soap and water .
sentences.chinese: 用肥皂和水彻底洗一洗。

sentences.english: a bar of soap
sentences.chinese: 一块肥皂

detailed_translations.english: the substance that you use to wash your body

detailed_translations.chinese: 将肥皂涂在……上；对……拍马屁（俚语）
detailed_translations.english: to rub soap on or over someone or something

sentences.english: They larded many commercials into a ten-minute period before the soap opera.
sentences.chinese: 他们在肥皂剧前的十分钟内插播了许多商业广告。

sentences.english: After some experience in theater, he landed a role in a soap opera and dropped out of high school just shy of graduation.
sentences.chinese: 在取得一些舞台剧演出经验之后，他获得一个肥皂剧的角色，于是没有等到高中毕业就辍学了。

detailed_translations.english: a television or radio story about the daily lives and relationships of the same group of people, which is broadcast regularly

sentences.english: the educational development of children
sentences.chinese: 儿童的教育发展

detailed_translations.english: relating to education

sentences.english: His plan is to get a degree in economics and then work abroad for a year.
sentences.chinese: 他计划先取得经济学学位，然后去国外工作一年。

sentences.english: Do you have any plans for the weekend?
sentences.chinese: 你周末有什么打算？

sentences.english: He immediately began planning his escape.
sentences.chinese: 他立即开始计划逃跑。

sentences.english: The former president is planning a return to politics.
sentences.chinese: 前总统打算重返政坛。

detailed_translations.english: something you have decided to do
to think carefully about something you want to do, and decide how and when you will do it

sentences.english: I do hope everything goes well.
sentences.chinese: 我真心希望一切顺利。

sentences.english: It was hoped that the job would be filled by a local person.
sentences.chinese: 希望该职位由当地人来担任。

sentences.english: Let’s just hope someone finds her bag.
sentences.chinese: 希望有人找到她的提包。

sentences.english: I hope to God I haven’t left the car window open.
sentences.chinese: 但愿我没有忘记关车窗。

sentences.english: When I first arrived in New York, I was full of hope for the future.
sentences.chinese: 我初到纽约时，对未来充满希望。

detailed_translations.english: to want something to happen or be true and to believe that it is possible or likely
a feeling of wanting something to happen or be true and believing that it is possible or likely

sentences.english: It makes you want to watch the next episode to find out what's going to happen.
sentences.chinese: 这使你想看下一集，以弄清接下来要发生什么。

sentences.english: I was relieved to find out that my problems were due to a genuine disorder.
sentences.chinese: 查明我的问题的确是失调造成的，我就放心了。

detailed_translations.english: If you find something out, you learn something that you did not already know, especially by making a deliberate effort to do so

sentences.english: class discussions
sentences.chinese: 课堂讨论

sentences.english: the topics suggested for discussion
sentences.chinese: 建议讨论的话题

sentences.english: We have had discussions about her legal situation.
sentences.chinese: 我们就她的法律状况已进行了讨论。

detailed_translations.english: when you discuss something

sentences.english: It looks like we’ll have to stand – there are no seats left.
sentences.chinese: 看来我们只能站着——没有座位了。

sentences.english: She stood in the doorway.
sentences.chinese: 她站在门口。

sentences.english: (= do not move ) and listen to me.
sentences.chinese: 站好别动，听我说。

sentences.english: Don’t just stand there (= stand and not do anything ) – help me!
sentences.chinese: 不要光站在那里，帮帮我！

detailed_translations.english: to support yourself on your feet or be in an upright position
used to say that you do not like someone or something at all, or that you think that something is extremely unpleasant
a piece of furniture or equipment used to hold or support something

sentences.english: When did the accident happen?
sentences.chinese: 事故什么时候发生的？

sentences.english: It’s impossible to predict what will happen next.
sentences.chinese: 不可能预测接下来会发生什么。

sentences.english: She carried on as if nothing had happened.
sentences.chinese: 她继续干，似乎什么都未曾发生。

sentences.english: This was bound to happen sooner or later.
sentences.chinese: 这事注定早晚会发生。

sentences.english: This kind of thing happens all the time.
sentences.chinese: 这种事一直在发生。

sentences.english: As it happens, I know someone who might be able to help.
sentences.chinese: 真巧，我正好认识一个人，这个人也许帮得上忙。

sentences.english: We happened to discover we had a friend in common.
sentences.chinese: 我们碰巧发现我们有个共同的朋友。

detailed_translations.english: when something happens, there is an event, especially one that is not planned

sentences.english: I may be late, so don’t wait for me.
sentences.chinese: 我可能会迟到，所以别等我。

sentences.english: Some chemicals may cause environmental damage.
sentences.chinese: 有些化学物品可能会给环境造成破坏。

sentences.english: There may not be enough money to pay for the repairs.
sentences.chinese: 可能钱不够支付修理费。

sentences.english: Well, I may have been wrong.
sentences.chinese: 好了，可能是我错了。

sentences.english: They may have called while you were out.
sentences.chinese: 你出去时他们可能给你打过电话。

sentences.english: It may be that Minoan ships were built and repaired here.
sentences.chinese: 米诺斯人的船可能就是在这里建造和修理的。

sentences.english: Your job may well involve some travelling (= it is fairly likely ) .
sentences.chinese: 你的工作很可能有时需要出差。

sentences.english: The problem may be solved in a number of different ways.
sentences.chinese: 这个问题可以用几种不同的方式解决。

sentences.english: We pray for those who died – may they rest in peace.
sentences.chinese: 我们为逝者祈祷——愿他们安息。

detailed_translations.english: if something may happen or may be true, there is a possibility that it will happen or be true but this is not certain

sentences.english: He will be hard to beat. I fully expect (= am completely sure about ) that and I’m ready.
sentences.chinese: 他很难击败。我确信这一点，不过我准备好了。

sentences.english: ‘Who are you?’ he murmured, only half expecting (= thinking it was possible, but not likely ) her to answer.
sentences.chinese: “你是谁？”他低声问道，预计她可能不会回答。

sentences.english: to expect a visit/call/letter from sb
sentences.chinese: 等待某人的来访 / 电话 / 来信

detailed_translations.english: to think that something will happen because it seems likely or has been planned

sentences.english: I couldn’t go out with someone for a joke, could you?
sentences.chinese: 我可不能拿谈恋爱当儿戏，对不对？

sentences.english: I never joke about money.
sentences.chinese: 我从不拿钱开玩笑。

detailed_translations.english: something that you say or do to make people laugh, especially a funny story or trick
to say things that are intended to be funny and that you do not really mean

sentences.english: a career in stand-up comedy
sentences.chinese: 单口喜剧表演职业

detailed_translations.english: entertainment that is intended to make people laugh

sentences.english: He said a few meaningless words to his hostess and looked around the room.
sentences.chinese: 他向女主人说了几句无关紧要的话，又环视了一下房间。

sentences.english: a repetitive and meaningless task
sentences.chinese: 重复且无意义的工作

detailed_translations.english: having no purpose or importance and therefore not worth doing or having

sentences.english: The government must take action (=do something) now to stop the rise in violent crime.
sentences.chinese: 政府现在必须采取行动遏止暴力犯罪的上升。

detailed_translations.english: the process of doing something, especially in order to achieve a particular thing

sentences.english: There was an old action movie next.
sentences.chinese: 接下来演的是一部老动作片。

sentences.english: Instead of going to see an action movie, take action in your own life.
sentences.chinese: 与其看动作片，不如花点心思在你的生活上。

sentences.english: a Walt Disney cartoon
sentences.chinese: 迪斯尼动画片

sentences.english: ...one of Britain's best-loved cartoon characters, Rupert the Bear.
sentences.chinese: 英国最受欢迎的漫画形象之一——鲁珀特熊

detailed_translations.english: a short film that is made by photographing a series of drawings

sentences.english: We speak Danish at home so that the boys don’t lose touch with their language and culture.
sentences.chinese: 我们在家说丹麦语，这样男孩子们就不会脱离他们的语言和文化。

sentences.english: In our culture, it is rude to ask someone how much they earn.
sentences.chinese: 在我们的文化里，问别人收入多少是不礼貌的。

sentences.english: I love working abroad and meeting people from diffe-rent cultures.
sentences.chinese: 我喜欢在国外工作，认识来自不同文化的人。

detailed_translations.english: the beliefs, way of life, art, and customs that are shared and accepted by people in a particular society

sentences.english: a famous actor
sentences.chinese: 著名演员

sentences.english: Many famous people have stayed in the hotel.
sentences.chinese: 许多名人都曾下榻这家酒店。

sentences.english: The Eiffel Tower is a famous landmark (= a famous place or building that is easy to recognize ) .
sentences.chinese: 埃菲尔铁塔是著名的地标。

sentences.english: Da Vinci’s world-famous portrait of the Mona Lisa
sentences.chinese: 达•芬奇的那幅闻名世界的肖像画《蒙娜丽莎》

detailed_translations.english: known about by many people in many places

sentences.english: Police have found what appear to be human remains.
sentences.chinese: 警方发现了疑似人体遗骸的东西。

sentences.english: He tried to make it appear that she had committed suicide.
sentences.chinese: 他试图制造她自杀的假象。

sentences.english: It may be less useful than it appears at first.
sentences.chinese: 这可能没有一开始显得那么有用。

sentences.english: Two faces appeared at our window.
sentences.chinese: 两张面孔出现在我们的窗口。

sentences.english: The car seemed to appear from nowhere.
sentences.chinese: 这辆车好像是突然间从哪里冒出来的。

detailed_translations.english: used to say how something seems, especially from what you know about it or from what you can see

sentences.english: The weather became warmer.
sentences.chinese: 天气变暖和了。

sentences.english: Slowly my eyes became accustomed to the darkness.
sentences.chinese: 我的眼睛渐渐适应了黑暗。

sentences.english: Helen became increasingly anxious about her husband’s strange behaviour.
sentences.chinese: 海伦越来越担心她丈夫的反常行为。

sentences.english: Pollution from cars has become a major problem.
sentences.chinese: 汽车污染已成为严重的问题。

sentences.english: When did you first want to become a teacher?
sentences.chinese: 你最早是什么时候想要当一名教师的？

detailed_translations.english: to start to have a feeling or quality, or to start to develop into something

sentences.english: Rich mineral deposits have been found in the sea bed.
sentences.chinese: 海底发现有丰富的矿床。

sentences.english: Red meat is a rich source of iron.
sentences.chinese: 红肉含有大量铁质。
